about_the_game:
In Seed Breed, you are trying to run a hobby farm... However, you keep getting distracted by three attractive local women. 

After 2 years of development, there are 3 women to play. Gift them items you find to win favor and unlock their 20+ actions. (5 sex acts on each woman) but be quick, because there are also 3 other guys per woman who will try to sex them up and block you! Luckily, you can bully or befriend the NPCs to lower their chances. I mean, you deserve all THREE women, right?

As you progress with the women, you can also 'train' each in 4 directions:
Perverted: Female orgasms, gangbangs and pimping.
Rebellion: Gender variations, control all aspects from simple-futa to full-male body.
Obedience: Bondge wear, 4 Chastity spots block NPCs, Slapping, Whipping, Choking.
Friendship: Treat her with respect and she'll date you, become loyal and even marry you!

content_descriptors.notes:
Progression through 20+ actions in simulated relationship starting with talking, flashing, undressing, touching, then sex, any of which can cause Female Orgasm. 5% chance of Pregnancy.

Male Orgasm types include: Whack-Off, Hand-Job, Bum-Job, Tit-Job, Blow-Job, Deep-Throat, Vaginal, Anal.

Optional content (you will be asked before each) includes: Loyalty, Marriage, Girlfriend-sharing, Pimping, Bondage Clothing, Slapping, Whipping, Choking, Gender-Changing progression through Enlarged-Clitoris, Futa-Penis, Grow-Testicles, Lose-Breasts, Grow-Muscles, to Full-Male

name: Seed 'n Breed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7~11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Flash AND exe version
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7~11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Flash AND exe version

short_description: Try to run a hobby-farm and seduce the three attractive local women. Gift them items you find to win favor and unlock their 20+ actions. (5 sex acts on each woman) but be quick, because there are 6 NPCs who will try to sex them up and block you!
